Title: East
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (based on the series of graphic novels by), Tony Moore (based on the series of graphic novels by), Charlie Adlard (based on the series of graphic novels by), Channing Powell (teleplay by), Scott M. Gimple (story by), Channing Powell (story by)
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Norman Reedus, Steven Yeun, Lauren Cohan
Plot: Rick and Morgan set out in the search for Carol. Meanwhile, Daryl and Rosita track down Dwight, as Glenn and Michonne fall into a trap.
